dailyPlans:

2. 8:00 AM to 9:00 AM: Breakfast and check emails, prepare for the day
3. 9:00 AM to 10:30 AM: Conduct market research to understand target audience preferences and needs for food brands
4. 10:30 AM to 12:00 PM: Analyze research findings and plan out strategies for brand positioning
5. 12:00 PM to 1:30 PM: Lunch break
6. 1:30 PM to 4:30 PM: Develop creative designs and marketing strategies based on research insights
7. 4:30 PM to 5:30 PM: Review work progress and plan for the next day
8. 5:30 PM to 7:30 PM: Personal time (exercise, relaxation, hobbies)
9. 7:30 PM to 9:00 PM: Dinner and catch up on social media or news
10. 9:00 PM to 10:30 PM: Read or watch something related to her field or prepare for tomorrow's work
11. 10:30 PM to 7:00 AM: Sleep and rest for the next day
